post.author: Art.of.War
post.body: where can i get doom3 tuturials and videos on how to build maps and play them help plzzzzzzzz thanx

post.author: Dinky
post.body:
It would be nice if you posted these questions and requests to the "level editing" forum instead of this one.

Level editing forum

And you can find tutorials here: http://www.modwiki.net/wiki/Tutorial_list

And also, please try and think of ALL the questions you have to ask, and gather them all up for just one post, instead of making multiple posts to spam.

post.author: zeh
post.body:
Please search or check the sticky posts before posting, and do not make repeated cross-postings about the same thing.

Thanks.
